name: #Degraded Autoforge
desc:
An almost entirely automonomous systems forge unit designed for use with the older Modular Fabricator technology; it’s less capable then it’s more advanced cousin, but still reliably produces better quality ship parts then a facility without one. A minor advantage is that the lower production rate of these devices tends to be less environmentally devestating, and the older technology less likely to incur the wrath of the Luddic Path.

This one has seen better days, and it’s abilities for producing defect-free components has decreased significantly. Nonetheless, having access to an autoforge at all is a step up as far as starship construction goes.

name: #Perfect Autoforge
desc:
An almost entirely automonomous systems forge unit designed for use with the older Modular Fabricator technology; it’s less capable then it’s more advanced cousin, but still reliably produces better quality ship parts then a facility without one. A minor advantage is that the lower production rate of these devices tends to be less environmentally devestating, and the older technology less likely to incur the wrath of the Luddic Path.

This one is in almost perfect condition and likely to produce ship parts that are as high quality as the technology can manage, given the overall state of manufacturing in the Sector.

name: Parallel Tooling Package
desc: An interchangable terminal system and attached microfactory.

name: Military Logistics Upgrade
desc: An interchangable terminal system and attached microfactory.

name: Specialized Systems Fabricators
desc: An interchangable terminal system and attached microfactory.

name: SRA Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the Yardie school of design.

name: SRA Highgrade Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct more advanced ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the Yardie school of design.

name: SRA Auxiliary Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a variety of auxiliary ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs from the Yardie school of design.

name: SRA Exports Package
desc: A set of common SRA plans modified to the specifications of the Persean League, uparmored and favoring a generally “midline” theory of design.
